## TextBufferObject.(constructor)

Constructs a new `TextBufferObject`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(glyphs: GlyphData[], buffer: Float32Array, bounds?: THREE.Box2 | undefined, characterBounds?: THREE.Box2[] | undefined, textRenderStyle?: TextRenderStyle | undefined, textLayoutStyle?: TextLayoutStyle | undefined);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  glyphs | [GlyphData](./harp-text-canvas.glyphdata.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Input glyphs. |
|  buffer | Float32Array | Buffer containing the data generated by \[\[TextCanvas\]\]. |
|  bounds | THREE.Box2 \| undefined | Optional text bounds. |
|  characterBounds | THREE.Box2\[\] \| undefined | Optional character bounds. |
|  textRenderStyle | [TextRenderStyle](./harp-text-canvas.textrenderstyle.md) \| undefined | \[\[TextRenderStyle\]\] applied by \[\[TextCanvas\]\]. |
|  textLayoutStyle | [TextLayoutStyle](./harp-text-canvas.textlayoutstyle.md) \| undefined | \[\[TextLayoutStyle\]\] applied by \[\[TextCanvas\]\]. |
